name: scary news
description: News about terrorism almost always appears in the mass media. The media is reporting how the world is currently experiencing chaos caused by the actions of terrorist groups. The group conducts acts of terror using violence, such as suicide bombings and so on. In this work I use the visual metaphor of a television that describes it as one of the mass media. Then came the figure who brought a weapon from inside the television as the embodiment of the news of terrorism presented in the mass media.
